author: bizkit
title: lame!
review: It's a weak technic model, the weakest I own. It's not much to do with it. As I know is the one and only ATX model, I wonder why. It resembles the the real ATX, but not much fun to play. The second model is catastrophic, I never built it, it was enough one look to see it has no use, they should have included it to the duplo category.

author: SimonStickfish
title: Not great
review: This set is not really great. I think every lego technic set should have at least two gears in it, or one gear and at least a steering column. This set has some cool shock absorbers, but that's about it.

author: hustla187
title: Not Bad Nor Good
review: This is a cool idea for Technic to do, but they built it in a messed up sort of way. The tires should be bigger and there isn't any detail at all. ATVs should look much better than this. Just stick with something else.
